breakthroughPP.preset

Interface Viewer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardStorage

    public interface Viewer
    Interface allowing to receive information from the game board

    Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016 expanded by CodeSalat

    • Method Detail

      • turn

        int turn()
        Indicate whose players turn is. 0 for player red, 1 for player blue
        Returns:
        the player who's turn it is.
        See Also:
        Setting

      • getDimX

        int getDimX()
        Get the width of the board
        Returns:
        the number of rows/ width.

      • getDimY

        int getDimY()
        Get the height of the board
        Returns:
        the number of lines/ height.

      • getColor

        int getColor(int letter,
           int number)
        Get the color of a certain field on the board Setting
        Parameters:
        letter - x dimension position
        number - y dimension position
        Returns:
        the color integer.

      • getStatus

        Status getStatus()
        Get the current status of the board
        Returns:
        the current status

      • getLastChange

        Move getLastChange()
        Function to return the last change on the board.
        Returns:
        the last move, which was placed on the board

      • getValidMoves

        java.util.HashSet<Move> getValidMoves(int color)
                                      throws PresetException
        Returns a set of valid moves for a player based on the current situation on the game board.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the player
        Returns:
        HashSet the valid moves of a player with color "color"
        Throws:
        PresetException - when the Board.getValidMoves(int color) throws an exception
